subject: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)
description_text:
Hello service@simsonn.com,

We're writing to let you know that the group you tried to contact (no-reply) may not exist, or you may not have permission to post messages to the group. A few more details on why you weren't able to post:

 * You might have spelled or formatted the group name incorrectly.
 * The owner of the group may have removed this group.
 * You may need to join the group before receiving permission to post.
 * This group may not be open to posting.

If you have questions related to this or any other Google Group, visit the Help Center at https://support.google.com/a/shopify.com/bin/topic.py?topic=25838.

Thanks,

shopify.com admins
